content:
Thunderbird for Android does not have calendar of its own.

You can post feature request in the following forum: https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird%20android

There is the same feature request in the above forum already, and you can upvote it: Calendar support on Thunderbird mobile https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/calendar-support-on-thunderbird-mobile/idi-p/76394
creator: Yu5tiqX9og
